name: KillSwitch (Tryston, veryhuman, J0N1, linusfackler, inkyTM, Faeyoung)
name_original: KillSwitch (Tryston, veryhuman, J0N1, linusfackler, inkyTM, Faeyoung)
description:
Ever wonder what it’s like to live on borrowed time?

Dash into an enemy to gain time - and a new body. You’ve got 20 seconds before death comes knocking, if your friends don’t shoot you first. Dodge, weave, shoot, and switch to avoid dying from the clock, glocks, and more. Kill your opponents to earn points, and do your best to stay alive. Just remember - time is always running out.

NOTE:
This game is meant to be played with multiple people with controllers in mind. Not as fun to play by yourself :3

NOTE 2:

The WebGL player is having problems. Try downloading the game instead? Please?
